content.p: Find the campus that's right for you You can view full details on Bonington Student Village via our Accommodation Options, please note we anticipate that only the following room type options will be available for our April intake. Applications for April 2025 will open here on 14 October 2024 via our online form. You will need to accept your licence/tenancy agreement and terms and conditions which include your full liability for all fees (subject to registering as a full time student at the University of Nottingham). If for any reason you will no longer be attending the University or do not require your accommodation, it is your responsibility to cancel your accommodation in accordance with the accommodation providers terms and conditions. Rooms are allocated by date order and we therefore recommend you apply as soon as you can. *Deluxe ensuites are very limited in numbers and as such may not be included on the application form but may still be offered.
